title: Win 2 Tickets To The Visions Festival Pre-Party
body:
Wow, well it’s competition season here at Crack In The Road.

First headphones, then festivals and now parties with XXYYXX, Dam Funk and Young Magic.

To celebrate the launch of this year’s [Visions Festival](http://visionsfestival.com/), the motley crew behind the indie inner-city celebrations have given us two tickets to their pre-party, taking place this Friday at The Laundry on Waburton Road.

[Visions Festival Pre-Party Giveaway](https://gleam.io/a1Wc9/visions-festival-preparty-giveaway)  

The one day festival, taking place in [four venues](http://visionsfestival.com/venues) across London Fields, promises to be a blinder. You can read about last year’s escapades [here](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/23779-live-review-visions-festival-2013/) and enter the competition above. The competition closes at midday tomorrow with winners announced Friday morning so you better be quick!

Tickets for Visions Festival are still available for a reasonable £30 [www.visionsfestival.com](http://www.visionsfestival.com/)
